about_the_game:
Game Introduction

“Phoskia” is an innovative game that blends 2.5D side-scrolling combat, tower defense elements, and strategic mechanics. Players will take on the role of the protagonist, leading soldiers to fend off waves of enemies and pushing forward through intense battles. The game delivers a thrilling real-time combat experience while emphasizing strategic deployment, allowing players to adapt to the ever-changing battlefield and secure victory through tactical planning.

Key Features

  • Strategic Deployment: Players can select soldiers from the troop library and deploy them according to battlefield conditions. With three main unit types—melee, ranged, and support—players must skillfully combine them to achieve optimal results.

  • Real-Time Combat: Players can directly control the protagonist to engage in combat and support their troops. The outcome of battles hinges on the effective use of skills and unit synergy.

  • Diverse Levels: Tower defense-style progression levels are enriched with varying terrains, enemy configurations, and unique events, offering layered challenges. Each level ties closely to the unfolding story, gradually revealing the secrets of Auristara.

Background Story

After the apocalypse of the Divine Era, the Goddess of Light Aurorany created a new world—Auristara—from her own body. The Kingdom of Vestpasia rose to power with its invincible army and the eternal might of "healing magic," ushering in a golden age. However, as the wars ceased, internal conflicts began to simmer beneath the surface. A thousand years later, the wise King Kleon implemented bold reforms, revitalizing the kingdom on the brink of collapse. Yet, rumors of his collusion with demonic forces cast a dark shadow over his reign. The outbreak of the Long Night War severely weakened Vestpasia, and during the Battle of the Red Wall, the heroic sacrifice of the common soldier Edgar Bulwark became a symbol of national pride. Ten years later, the fragile peace was shattered when undead creatures summoned through necromancy overran the royal capital. As the kingdom's fate hung in the balance, Prince Egbert embarked on his journey of adventure...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Recommended resolution is 1080p, with low graphics settings for smooth performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 1080p or 1440p with high graphics settings.

short_description: Prince Egbert of Vestpasia embarks on a quest for vengeance across seven kingdoms, facing the harsh truths of history.In a 2.5D art style, combine real-time combat with strategic gameplay and shape your unique revenge story.
